year_collection.title: Collection_Year
year_collection.regex_validation_message: must be a YYYY format year or '_'

age_years.title: Age_years
age_years.regex_validation_message: should be a valid 1 to 3 digit number

age_months.regex_validation_message: should be a valid 1 to 4 digit number

age_days.title: Age_days
age_days.regex_validation_message: should be a valid 1 to 4 digit number

penicillin.title: Penicillin
penicillin.regex_validation_message: should be a valid floating point number; can start with '>','<', '>=' or '<=' and optionally end with units "mm" or "µg/ml" ('u' permitted in place of 'µ'); or alternatively S, I, or R

amoxicillin.regex_validation_message: should be a valid floating point number; can start with '>','<', '>=' or '<=' and optionally end with units "mm" or "µg/ml" ('u' permitted in place of 'µ'); or alternatively S, I, or R
